bossDialog: Ahh, perfect. I just finished forging some new weapons and armor. You'll make a fine test of their strength!
I hope you're a more worthy challenge than the last five weaklings who blundered in here.
May my blades be sharp. May my armor hold fast. May my wit be swift and my muscles swifter. May Gonfurian grant me glory this day.

cardBonuses.4: Increases the base amount of {RES_BRIMSTONE} gained from battles by 15.
cardBonuses.7: You have a 15% chance to gain double {RES_BRIMSTONE} from battles.

master.dialog: Minotaurs have some serious anger issues, but when it comes time for a battle, that's just fine with me. Let's see how your creatures stand up against my army of crazed berserkers!
master.name: Ogron

name: Minotaur
